page.title: 02 EDUCATION
page.content: We've interviewed two schools,one a private school,the other a state school. PRIVATE SCHOOL. We interviewed the senior master from Highgate Boys'School.He enjoyed teaching in the private sector and has never taught in a state school.He regrets never teaching in a state school and thinks that teachers should rotate through both systems. The numbers of pupils attending the school from different ethnic groups is noticeably low.The master pointed out that they were neither encouraged or discouraged. There are 600 pupils in the senior school,they are divided into 5 forms per year and these classes have an average of 26 pupils.The class numbers vary from subject to subject.The pupils are streamed in ability from A-E.Class
